transcription: Hi, I'm here to pick up the new timetable.
Okay, which course are you on?
It's the Foundation course in Civil and Structural Engineering.
So, in semester 1, you take mathematics, mechanics, physics and information and communications technology.
Lectures are in the Tresham Building and they start at 10 o'clock in the morning.
What time do the lectures end?
You have lab work in the afternoon every Wednesday and Thursday.
Dr. Boot supervises these sessions and a lab technician attends the lab work sessions too.
On Monday and Tuesday, you go to your tutor for a tutorial session.
You don't have any classes on Fridays.
